lines.text: create new integers i and j

for i from 0 to length of str exclusive

lines.text: start for loop from j = 0 to length of s exclusive incrementing j

lines.text: if str [ i ] is equal to s [ j ] , break the loop

lines.text: if D is equal to " R "
change M to the concatenation of M and s [ j + 1 ]
